page.title: 09DUNDONALD _ A TYPICAL FAMILY
page.content: My family live in the village of Dundonald in a Local Authority Council house. It is a five-roomed, semi-detatched house with a fairly small garden which my dad quite enjoys keeping tidy. My dad works as an engineer at British Aerospace 10 miles away at Prestwick. The firm has just won an Â£84 million contract for their Jetstream aircraft so my dad's job should be safe for a while! My Mum works too as an nurse at the big new hospital at Crosshouse. She likes it there because it is very modern. My big brother goes to Marr College and my little brother and I go to Dundonald Primary School which we like a lot. We all like living in the village and would not like to go back to Glasgow!
